document_data.mainbody:
Orgula Samshroon was a clerk inhabiting the city of Waterdeep during the mid–1360s DR.
She gave off a strong matronly vibe. Orgula never forgot a face and was quite cheerful. She was rather short.
Orgula worked as a counter clerk in Auroras Realms Shop, Street of Tusks Catalogue Counter within Waterdeeps Trades Ward. Her vast knowledge of Faerûn, and the items carried within the shop, made her a valuable asset to the company.
Orgula was a secret contact for the Harpers and served as a set of eyes for Piergeiron Paladinson himself.
